lines.text: Look, Your Majesty, I don't want to insult you or anything, but are you nuts? This isn't the castle. This is the real, in-your-face, carjacking, drive-by-shooting, kill-you-for-your-Reeboks street life.
I get your room if you get killed.
Camelot rots, and I play at being king. I want her great again.
Let's boogey.
Geez, this always works in the movies!
Lord Elastic!

[to Kane, after the King's announcement that anyone can enter the tournament]
That's your cue, professor.
Declare my victory!
Wrong again, dweeb.

[after Calvin gives him a candy bar]
You are truly a great knight!
It does not take a sword and stone to make a hero.

[seeing Calvin in his underwear]
You Recedans wear very strange garments.

[looks down, realizes he is in his boxer shorts]
Oh!
[struggling to put his pants on]
Excuse me!
[referring to Lord Belasco]
Oh, the dork in the purple dress. We've met.
What's to become of our family?
I know not, but I will always look after thee
No, I'm afraid Rock n' Roll will not work this time.
You're wrong.
[He takes out the disc man]
It is the great equalizer.
[He unleashes a red beam from the disc man on the head guard, causing him to fall off from the back side of the castle]
